taskDescription: Asks ALFRED to show light meal suggestions for the day
Reviews simple beverage-based meal options from ALFRED

Confirms to ALFRED that she has drunk her herbal tea
Avoids engaging in activities she finds unnecessary or challenging
Presses the push-to-talk button to start interaction with ALFRED
Asks ALFRED about her daily schedule
Requests simple information like the weather
Asks ALFRED to remind her to drink herbal tea
Chooses to stay offline during group video calls
Requests ALFRED to report her vital signs on demand
Requests ALFRED to remind her only when she asks

Dismiss detailed explanations about system features
Request ALFRED to keep explanations simple and avoid interruptions
Choose to arrange nurse check-ins offline rather than via video calls
Limit engagement with ALFRED to essential functions only
Maintain controlled communication and avoid spontaneous interactions
